message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is a great deal, considering its true value is much higher. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1200000. This is a fair price considering its true value. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1100000. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1150000. This is the best I can do. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1090000. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm sorry, Bob, but I've already gone as low as I can. I'm not willing to go any lower than $1150000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1150000 and $1090000. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1120000. What do you think?
